org.apache.jena.atlas.web.auth

Class ScopedAuthenticator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.jena.atlas.web.auth.AbstractCredentialsAuthenticator
      • org.apache.jena.atlas.web.auth.AbstractScopedAuthenticator<Pair<String,char[]>>
        • org.apache.jena.atlas.web.auth.ScopedAuthenticator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HttpAuthenticator

    public class ScopedAuthenticator
extends AbstractScopedAuthenticator<Pair<String,char[]>>

    A credentials based authenticator where credentials are scoped to URIs. This allows for a single authenticator to present different credentials to different URIs as appropriate.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ScopedAuthenticator(Map<URI,Pair<String,char[]>> credentials)
      Creates an authenticator with a set of credentials for URIs
      ScopedAuthenticator(URI target, String username, char[] password)
      Creates an authenticator with credentials for the given URI
